mapper.select: SELECT rst.rst_no, rst.rst_name, rst.star, rst.loc, rst.loc_dtl, rst.catag_no, catag.catag_nm, rst.tel, rst.opn_tm, rst.brck_tm, rst.dnnr_tm, rst.lo_tm FROM rst rst INNER JOIN rst_catag catag ON rst.catag_no = catag.catag_no WHERE 1 ORDER BY rst.rst_no ASC

SELECT rst.rst_no, rst.rst_name, rst.star, rst.loc, rst.loc_dtl, rst.catag_no, catag.catag_nm, rst.tel, rst.opn_tm, rst.brck_tm, rst.dnnr_tm, rst.lo_tm FROM rst rst INNER JOIN rst_catag catag ON rst.catag_no = catag.catag_no WHERE rst.rst_no = #{id}
